title: Poems to Make Your Friends Scream
description: Featuring a fantastic array of traditional and modern poems, all guaranteed to make your friends scream! With fresh, stylish illustrations from newcomer Jess Mikhail, this is a collection which will have enormous appeal to anyone who likes a really good fright! * Susie Gibbs is the best-selling anthologist and editor behind many of Macmillan's most successful collections. * Follow-up to Poems to Freak Out Your Teachers and Poems to Annoy Your Parents.
